title: How to Shuffle Themes on a Nintendo 3DS

steps.headline: Update your 3DS, if you haven't already.
Go to the house and wrench icon in the upper left-hand corner of the bottom screen.
Tap "Shuffle Favorites".
steps.description: Select up to 10 of your favorite themes.

steps.headline: Confirm the change, and then exit.
Every time you go to the home menu, the theme will shuffle.

text: Update your 3DS, if you haven't already. Wait for it to load. Go to the house and wrench icon in the upper left-hand corner of the bottom screen.  Go to Change Theme.  Tap "Shuffle Favorites". Select up to 10 of your favorite themes. Confirm the change, and then exit.  Every time you go to the home menu, the theme will shuffle.
